title: FSharp: Learning to use FAKE and Paket
teaser: Background: A year ago I discovered F# to be the next big thing in .Net world (apart from .Net core). F# is a functional-first language with OO capabilities. I quickly fell in love with it. I come from Javascript background and I had lost my touch with the back-end. Learning F# proved to be an excellent opportunity for me to hone my back-end skills and get acquainted with .Net way of doing things.
